description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) of PP/2013/1293 granted 20/10/2014 for two storey rear extension, creation of basement level to rear (with rear garden lightwells) raising of roof by 600mm to create habitable loft space, rear roof extensions, side roof extension, installation of two rooflights to east roofslope, three rooflights to west roofslope, alterations to openings and internal alterations to convert one, four bedroom house into five self-contained units (2 x three-bed and 3 x two-bed flats). Amendments to provide for: alterations, repositioning and reduction of roof lights to side and rear elevations; alterations and repositioning of fenestration and doors to side and rear elevations; additional door and windows to side (east) elevation; the removal of part of the rear extension to allow for an additional hidden lightwell to basement; additional window to side (west) elevation and rear facing window into this 'hidden lightwell' area; removal of chimneys to side (west) elevation; repositioning of side (west) dormer; alterations to internal layout.
